text: The Permanent Committee on Geographical Names (PCGN)PCGN is an acronym. PCGN stands for "Permanent Committee on Geographical Names". is an independent government agency in the United Kingdom. Its function is to establish standard names for places outside the UK, but not including Antarctica.Permanent Committee on Geographical Names (PCGN). "Work of PCGN"; retrieved 2012-6-18. The decisions about names are for the use of the British government. ==History== Permanent Committee on Geographical Names was established in 1919.PCGN, "Home"; retrieved 2012-6-18.
